name: Small Kormir Icon
description:
Grants a tiny amount of karma.

<c=@Flavor>Kormir is beloved throughout Tyria, but Elonians who know her history are often proud to have one of their own in the pantheon.</c>

name: Mist Attunement 3
description:
Become one with the Mists and gain the following:
• The "Fractal Champion" title
• 5 agony resistance, 2% increased outgoing damage, and 25 health per second in fractals for every character in your account
• 1 additional fractal encryption and bag of fractal relics from the final chest in every fractal
Level 3 of 4—Effects stack with previous level.

details.description:
Gain Condition Damage Equal to 3% of Your Toughness

+10% Experience from Kills
